summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定在创建组件时设计器是否自动显示组件的智能标记面板。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether a designer shows a component's smart tag panel automatically on creation.

value.span: 如果允许组件的智能标记面板在创建时自动打开，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to allow a component's smart tag panel to open automatically upon creation; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性为时，组件的智能标记面板设置为自动打开 `true` 。A component's smart tag panel is set to automatically open when the property is `true`.

related.span: 演练：向 Windows 窗体组件添加智能标记

span.span: Walkthrough: Adding Smart Tags to a Windows Forms Component

span.span: Gets or sets a value that enables or disables the component cache.

value.span: 如果启用组件缓存，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the component cache is enabled; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 组件缓存是一种性能增强，与某些设计器不兼容。The component cache is a performance enhancement that is incompatible with certain designers. 您可以通过此属性禁用它。You can disable it with this property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Visual Studio 的 "**工具**" 菜单的 "**选项**" 项中未显示此选项。This option is not exposed on the **Options** item of the **Tools** menu in Visual Studio.
